articles.title: Greetings to President of Myanmar
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Myanmar
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Thein Sein, president of Myanmar, on the 66th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message sincerely wished the president and people of Myanmar bigger successes in their work for stability and economic development of the country and the Republic of the Union of Myanmar prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Myanmar FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Myanmar FM
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Saturday sent a message of greeting to his Myanmar counterpart Wunna Maung Lwin on the 66th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed confidence that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would invariably grow stronger.

articles.title: New DPRK Ambassador to Spain Appointed
articles.content:
New DPRK Ambassador to Spain Appointed
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyok Chol was appointed as the DPRK ambassador to Spain according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a new stamp (individual) to celebrate the New Year Juche 103 (2014).
					 Seen on the stamp are letters "Happy New Year" against landscapes of Pyongyang in winter.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Leap Forward at "Masikryong Speed"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Leap Forward at "Masikryong Speed"
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial calls upon all the service personnel and people to dash ahead at the "Masikryong speed" under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and glorify this as a year of grandiose struggle, a year of sea changes, in which they will usher in a golden age of Songun Korea.
					 The "Masikryong speed" is a new speed for grand socialist construction, a result of Kim Jong Un's great plan for building a rich and powerful nation and his leadership based on patriotic devotion, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 Reflecting in the speed are the spirit of the country bringing about a leap forward with dynamism, the Korean-style mode and stamina of creation and the aspiration and will of the army and people to advance faster and with greater energy toward the world standards.
					
					 The completion of the construction of the world-class ski resort in a matter of a little over one year is a historic  miracle which can be wrought only by service personnel of the Korean People's Army equipped with the revolutionary soldier spirit, the spirit of devotedly implementing the orders and instructions of the Workers' Party of Korea unconditionally and to the end.
					
					 The Masikryong Ski Resort, a grand monumental structure in the era of Songun, is a precious fruition of the harmonious whole of the army and people single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 All the service personnel and people should raise a hot wind of a leap forward and advance and struggle in the same spirit and stamina as displayed by them when creating the "Masikryong speed".
					
					 They should launch a high-pitched drive for a leap forward on all fronts for building a thriving country at the "Masikryong speed".

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Busy with Saber-rattling from Outset of New Year
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Busy with Saber-rattling from Outset of New Year
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The 28th Division of the south Korean puppet army is mulling staging north-targeted war drills in the areas of Tongduchon and Ryonchon, Kyonggi Province, from January 6, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The puppet warmongers plan to conduct severe winter tactical drills with huge troops involved till February 14 under the pretext of someone's "infiltration and provocation of a local war".
					
					 Earlier, the puppet marine corps staged a madcap military exercise under the simulated conditions of an actual war on Paekryong Islet in the West Sea of Korea at the beginning of the New Year.
					
					 These war drumbeats in the forefront areas are driving the situation into a crisis.

articles.title: December Issue of Magazine Thongil Published
articles.content:
December Issue of Magazine Thongil Published
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans brought out the December issue of Thongil, its monthly socio-political magazine.
					 The magazine carried the news that supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site and gave field guidance to the Masikryong Ski Resort near its completion and guided the enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, illustrated with his photos.
					
					 It gave accounts of the news that Kim Jong Un visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay high tribute to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise and a national memorial service was solemnly held in Pyongyang.
					
					 It carried a special write-up on the occasion of the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. It praised Kim Jong Suk, the woman commander of Mt. Paektu, for devotedly protecting the headquarters of the Korean revolution during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 The magazine introduced major monthly news in 2013.
					
					 It also edited international news.

articles.title: Korean Organization in China Calls for Dynamic Patriotic Action for National Reunification
articles.content:
Korean Organization in China Calls for Dynamic Patriotic Action for National Reunification 
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, Thursday made public a statement titled "Let us open up new phase of national reunification by concerted efforts of 70 million Koreans".
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China are filled with the ardent will to put the earliest possible end to the tragedy of national split and achieve national reunification upon receiving the historic New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the statement said, and went on: 
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south should more dynamically wage a sacred patriotic struggle to bring earlier the independent reunification of the country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans as clarified by the three principles of national reunification and the north-south joint declarations, true to the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Though difficulties lie in the way of national reunification, the nation has a bright prospect and the cause of national reunification is sure to be accomplished as Kim Jong Un representing the destiny of the nation and lodestar of national reunification is determinedly steering the nation in the efforts to realize the lifelong wishes of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 An immensely rosy future is in store for the Koreans advancing along the way indicated by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China will wage a strenuous patriotic movement for bringing about a fresh phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year without fail, fully confident that the day will come before long when a reunified thriving nation will appear thanks to the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un, brilliant Songun commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Hungarian Political Figures Visit DPRK Mission
articles.content:
Hungarian Political Figures Visit DPRK Mission
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The chairman and the vice-chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party visited the DPRK mission on Dec. 27 last year in celebration of the second anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 They placed a bouquet before portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- There took place abroad events on the occasions of the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 A celebration and Korean book and photo show were held in Myanmar and round-table talks in Pakistan and Malaysia on Dec. 28 and 29 last year.
					
					 Portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were displayed in the venues of the events.
					
					 On display were photos documenting feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Also displayed there were books and photos introducing the invincible might of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the struggle of the servicepersons and people to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, said:
					
					 The KPA under Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un has grown stronger to be invincible revolutionary armed forces that have achieved great unity with the people. It has greatly contributed to the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 We are convinced that the army and people of the DPRK will as ever bolster up the defense capability of the country in every way and perform fresh miracles in the efforts to build a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, Ghulam Rabbani, chairman of the Karachi Juche Study Center of Pakistan, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Un as a peerlessly great man who has successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun, which were pioneered and victoriously advanced by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					  A director of a Malaysian company noted that Kim Jong Suk bravely fought against the ferocious Japanese imperialist aggressors for the liberation of Korea, adding that her feats would remain shining forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Website by Peruvian Social Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Website by Peruvian Social Body
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted by the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship on its website on Dec. 27 last year.
					 The talk was carried by Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, the organ of the Korean People's Army, on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), clarifies the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and the tasks to be fulfilled to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a presidente de Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a presidente de Myanmar 
Pyongyang, 4 de enero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 4 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar, Thein Sein, con motivo del 66o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					El remitente desea al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en las labores para la estabilidad y el desarrollo economico del pais y la prosperidad de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun felicita a Wunna Maung Lwin
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun felicita a Wunna Maung Lwin
						
Pyongyang, 4 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 66o aniversario de la independencia de Myanmar, el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea   Pak Ui Chun envio el dia 4 un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo de ese pais, Wunna Maung Lwin.
					En la misiva, el remitente expresa la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran de continuo las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Espana
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Espana
						
Pyongyang, 4 de enero (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Hyok Chol fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en el Reino de Espana.

articles.title: Emitido en RPDC sello dedicado al Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Emitido en RPDC sello dedicado al Ano Nuevo
						
Pyongyang, 4 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo 103 (2014) de la Era Juche, la Direccion Estatal de Sellos de Corea emitio un sello individual.
					En el se lee la frase "Feliz Ano Nuevo" y se ve el paisaje invernal de Pyongyang que se transforma cada dia mas en la actual epoca de prosperidad de la construccion.
